title: T206 Cy Young Green Portrait for sale.....low grade......Price Reduced.......SOLD
author: philliesfan

posts.post_title: T206 Cy Young Green Portrait for sale.....low grade......Price Reduced.......SOLD
posts.post_content:
I have this T206 Cy Young card for sale.  As you can see, it is in rough condition.  I have no idea what it may be worth in this condition so I am going to start asking $215.00 postpaid.  If it sells, great.  If not, I will reduce pricing a day at a time.  Thanks for looking.
Robert
